forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mix of rain and snow. Low 0C.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers. Lows overnight in the low 30s.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain and snow. Low near 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers this evening. Snow showers overnight. Low 31F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning transitioning to light rain late. High 4C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers in the morning changing to all rain in the afternoon. High 39F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low -1C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Low near 30F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High near 5C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun early, then becoming cloudy later in the day. High around 40F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low -1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low near 30F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will become overcast in the afternoon. High 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun early, then becoming cloudy later in the day. High 36F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies with a few snow showers late. Low -3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early giving way to a few snow showers after midnight. Low 27F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Increasing clouds with showers arriving sometime in the afternoon. High 3C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High 38F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain and snow. Low 2C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow. Low near 35F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 90%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow early changing to all rain and becoming intermittent late. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning changing to all rain in the afternoon. Temps nearly steady in the mid to upper 30s. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 90%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers early. Breaks in the overcast later. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers before midnight. Becoming partly cloudy later. Low 28F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 38F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low -4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low around 25F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers in the morning will give way to a mixture of rain and snow in the afternoon. High 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers becoming mixed with rain later. High near 35F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low 28F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers in the morning will give way to a mixture of rain and snow in the afternoon. High 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers in the morning will give way to a mixture of rain and snow in the afternoon. High 34F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low -3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Flurries and a few snow showers throughout the night. Low 26F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow showers changing to rain showers as the day progresses. High 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Icy conditions will develop during the day as scattered snow showers change to light freezing rain. High 34F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low -4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. Low near 25F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%.
